description:
Flower of Love Blooms: Chevy and the others were happy today and went to the beach to relax. Until they meet with the comic duo named Chip and Tap as they all play in the beach. However, Chip later fell in love with Mikey, who is on the beach and the others need to do something to win his heart. As they ask Kumampa for advice, is it enough for Chip to win his heart?
Fortune Telling Zoobles: As Chevy and Panky went to Coron`s house, the two learned that she is reading her own fortune from a book. They all then consulted to Reel and asked him if he can read their fortunes, however, one of the predictions to Coron caused her a lot of bad luck throughout the day as he predicted that something that shine is gonna happen with her love life. As the this prediction affected her, the predictions for Chevy and Panky are affecting them as well.

titles.title: Flower of Love Blooms / Fortune Telling Zoobles
Koi no Hana Saku Koto mo Aru / Uranai Zoobles
恋の花咲くこともある / 占いズーブルズ
